about_the_game:
The Gemcrusty Artbook is a collection of art and artist notes centered around the concept of Gemcrusties, which are a type of fictional creature or character. The book is designed to be sold separately, and it includes three main components:

Concept Art


  • The concept art section includes various sketches, illustrations, and digital art that showcase the design and visual aspects of the Gemcrusty. This section may also include character designs, environments, and other elements related to the Gemcrusty' world.

Artist's Notes


  • The artist's notes section provides insight into the creative process behind the Gemcrusty designs. This section may include commentary, annotations, and explanations from the artists about their thought process, inspiration, and design choices.

Art Assets


  • The art asset section includes high-quality images of the Gemcrusty characters and other design elements that can be used for various purposes, such as creating fan art or promotional materials.

Overall, the Gemcrusty Artbook provides a comprehensive and immersive experience for fans of the Gemcrusty. It allows them to delve deeper into the world of these unique characters and gain a better understanding of the creative process behind their design.
